channel.title: KevinCTofel tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KevinCTofel.

item.description: Ecobee Thermostat Premium review coming tomorrow at https://t.co/ZemGgGp1zu (And then I have to touch up the wall since our contractor painted around the old unit üôÑ) Stay tuned! https://t.co/CC8YJEpitR
ICYMI: The 2022 ‚Å¶@Acer‚Å© Chromebook Spin 513 with the newest ‚Å¶@MediaTek‚Å© ARM chip is now available for $614.99 https://t.co/b2L3pAnkrQ

@RonKJeffries I use Linux daily on my Chromebook and it has an 8th-gen Intel Core i5. I‚Äôm sure that Lenovo can handle it fairly well, depending on the use case. I have 16 GB of RAM on my device, which does give me some headroom when running Linux but 8 GB should be plenty.
@RonKJeffries Lenovo IdeaPad 5 Chromebook. On sale now at $440. 8 GB of RAM and 11th-gen Core i3. https://t.co/Oj0VntmnM7

@AraWagco I haven't tested the battery life of this new Spin 513 with Kompanio 1380; don't have one in hand. What did you find in terms of battery life? Guessing this is lighter too, which may matter for some.
The 2022 Acer Chromebook Spin 513 is now available. $615 seems high on the surface for an ARM device. Dig deeper and it sounds about right. https://t.co/b2L3pAnkrQ
Haven‚Äôt driven that much in the first 1.5 weeks after getting the Model 3 (we drive less than the average person) but I like where this is going to trend. https://t.co/OB4p7t0pkP
ICYMI: Chromebooks get these 6 new Chrome OS 102 features https://t.co/Pc5tBSNfRa https://t.co/HYOjz2u9i5
Chromebooks get these 6 new Chrome OS 102 features https://t.co/Pc5tBSNfRa
Pre-dinner relaxation ride. https://t.co/qIrA9EI2Rx
ICYMI: This is the Chromebook I would buy from these Memorial Day deals https://t.co/o5pEmVg6ux
A trio of Chromebooks are on sale with Memorial Day deals in the U.S. Out of them, this is the Chromebook I would buy. https://t.co/o5pEmVg6ux
ICYMI: Google cans saving tab groups in the Chrome side panel https://t.co/m8FmcjUjpH
Are you a big saved tab groups user in Chrome? Google planned to put these in the side panel but that effort is on hold. And I‚Äôm OK with that. https://t.co/m8FmckbUhf
Can you build a brand new Commodore 64 from (nearly) 100% new parts? (Spoiler: Yes, but it‚Äôs nifty to see how!) https://t.co/eUaXNmNh4n via @YouTube
ICYMI: Another Chrome OS 101 update arrives with a big focus on Lacros https://t.co/GKNHw0SoWD
Norm asked for a new headshot, so I obliged. He‚Äôs so high maintenance. ü§£ https://t.co/i3HUpJVzKp
I missed those new/upcoming web dev features in March, so surfacing now in case you did too. ü§ì https://t.co/Lub599VZaw
A new Chrome OS 101 update is out on the Stable Channel. Along with a few fixes, many mentions of Lacros suggest it‚Äôs coming soon. https://t.co/GKNHw0SoWD
Watch John Lennon perform 'Stand By Me' in 1975... (@FarOutMag) https://t.co/tuIFnqdHso
This is a tiny language and an engine for selecting specific parts of a JS object, hiding/masking the rest. üëçhttps://t.co/RNxWwlovj9
The best cover songs are actually the original band pulling it off 37 years later and sounding this good. https://t.co/lyMZ4gnOCc

And the 20 year old central AC unit thinks it‚Äôs 21. Dead compressor. üôÑ https://t.co/7SfnuKmps2
I thought the Blockchain was supposed to FIX everything! Then I realized the error of my logic. Blockchain is decentralized and I have central air. ü§î
I‚Äôm gonna take an educated guess and say this dual run capacitor is at least part of, if not all of, the problem. Shouldn‚Äôt be bulging at the top. $15 replacement from Amazon arrives tomorrow. ü§ûüèº https://t.co/M0tOSbvAi2
Spare flux capacitor delivered and installed by the Chief Engineer. AC Warp Drive now operating with normal parameters. Red Alert cancelled! https://t.co/ZWlglf0CwL
@KorwinnH That‚Äôs a really sweet vehicle! Good luck!

It‚Äôs been a crazy, challenging week but it ended on a good note: Delivered. https://t.co/yZRee3LyKR
Added bonus: We took our MSF training course and passed our PA motorcycle road test. Bye bye permits! Was a great father/son experience with @tylerjtofel. He can‚Äôt decide between Beatles modes: Late McCartney hair/beard but round Lennon glasses. ü§£ https://t.co/RFgRjBNVaF
